summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化为字节流，并将其复制到作为 参数提供的流对象。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content into a stream of bytes and copies it to the stream object provided as the parameter.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在将所有内容写入作为 `stream` 参数传递的流对象之后，将完成返回的 对象。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the stream object passed as the `stream` parameter.

summary.span: 采用异步操作将 HTTP 内容序列化到内存流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory stream as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容写入内存流后，返回的 对象将会完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the memory stream. 操作完成后，返回任务对象上的 属性包含表示 HTTP 内容的内存流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the memory stream that represents the HTTP content. 然后，可以使用各种流 Api 使用返回的流读取内容。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs. 方法将内容缓冲到内存流。The method buffers the content to a memory stream. 如果有更好的方法将内容检索为流，派生类可以重写此行为。Derived classes can override this behavior if there is a better way to retrieve the content as stream. 例如，字节数组或字符串可以使用更高效的方法，例如，围绕字节或字符串环绕只读 。）For example, a byte array or a string could use a more efficient method way such as wrapping a read-only around the bytes or string.)

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。当 `true``disposing` 参数时，此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 以异步操作的形式将 HTTP 内容序列化为内存缓冲区。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 以异步操作的形式将 HTTP 内容序列化为内存缓冲区。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容序列化到内存缓冲区后，将完成返回的 对象。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the memory buffer. 将内容序列化到内存缓冲区后，对其中一个 方法的调用会将内存缓冲区的内容复制到目标流中。After content is serialized to a memory buffer, calls to one of the methods will copy the content of the memory buffer to the target stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync(int64 maxBufferSize) cil managed
Public Function LoadIntoBufferAsync (maxBufferSize As Long) As Task

param.name: maxBufferSize
param.span: 要使用的缓冲区最大大小。（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 以异步操作的形式将 HTTP 内容序列化为内存缓冲区。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容序列化到内存缓冲区后，将完成返回的 对象。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the memory buffer. 将内容序列化到内存缓冲区后，对其中一个 方法的调用会将内存缓冲区的内容复制到目标流中。After content is serialized to a memory buffer, calls to one of the methods will copy the content of the memory buffer to the target stream. 如果内容超出了在 `maxBufferSize` 参数中传递的值，则会引发异常。If the content exceeds the value passed in the `maxBufferSize` parameter , an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<unsigned int8[]> ReadAsByteArrayAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsByteArrayAsync () As Task(Of Byte())

summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化到字节数组，此为异步操作。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a byte array as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容都编写为字节数组后，返回的 对象将完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written as a byte array. 操作完成后，返回任务对象上的 属性包含 HTTP 内容的字节数组。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the byte array with the HTTP content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.IO.Stream> ReadAsStreamAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsStreamAsync () As Task(Of Stream)

summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化并返回将内容表示为异步操作的流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content and return a stream that represents the content as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 返回的 对象将在所有表示内容的流已读取后完成。The returned object will complete after all of the stream that represents content has been read. 操作完成后，返回任务对象上的 属性包含表示 HTTP 内容的流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the stream that represents the HTTP content. 然后，可以使用各种流 Api 使用返回的流读取内容。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<string> ReadAsStringAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsStringAsync () As Task(Of String)

summary.span: 将 HTTP 内容序列化到字符串，此为异步操作。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a string as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将所有内容都编写为字符串后，将完成返回的 对象。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written as a string. 操作完成后，返回任务对象上的 属性包含带有 HTTP 内容的字符串。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the string with the HTTP content.

summary.span: 以异步操作的形式将 HTTP 内容序列化为流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a stream as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在将所有内容序列化为 `stream` 参数传递的流对象之后，返回的 对象将完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the stream object passed in the `stream` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract bool TryComputeLength (out long length);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryComputeLength([out] int64& length) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function TryComputeLength (ByRef length As Long) As Boolean
protected public: abstract bool TryComputeLength([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % length);

param.name: length
param.span: HTTP 内容的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length in bytes of the HTTP content.

summary.span: 确定 HTTP 内容是否具有有效的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Determines whether the HTTP content has a valid length in bytes.

returns.span: 如果 是有效长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is a valid length; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 方法，HTTP 内容可以计算内容长度。The method gives a HTTP content the ability to calculate the content length. 这对于能够轻松计算内容长度的内容类型很有用。This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length. 如果无法或昂贵地计算内容长度（要求系统缓冲序列化会消耗大量内存或需要系统分配大量内存的完整内容），则此方法可能会返回 `false`。If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`. 如果此方法返回 `false`，这意味着需要分块传输，或者必须在将内容发送到服务器之前缓冲内容。If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server.
